name: 38th Annual Key West Fantasy Fest
short_description: This outrageous 10-day costuming and masking celebration features flamboyant masquerade competitions including one for pets, a headdress ball,
long_description: This outrageous 10-day costuming and masking celebration features flamboyant masquerade competitions including one for pets, a headdress ball, exuberant promenades, street fairs and a grand parade that stars marching groups, island-style bands and lavish floats. The 2017 festival theme is “Time Travel Unravels.”
